title: Any item cannot be selected at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at first attempt in the library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Expected behavior: The item should be selectable on the first attempt.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, no item can be selected at the first time.
EB: After the first attempt, when I select the same item again, it can be selected successfully.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item.
3. Check if the item can be selected on the first attempt.
